name: Knights VS Kaiju
description:
The Kingdom of Gi-Gant is being attacked by kaijus. Take the role of Sir Ul-Trah, the Titan Knight, and fight back against them!

Made for Kaijujam 2023

How to play :

  • Game is playable using keyboard
  • Control guide will be displayed on screen

Credits :
